contentrichtext.text: {{Chinese name|Qian ([[wiktionary:钱|钱]])}} {{Chinese|s=钱乃荣|t=錢乃榮|p=Qián Nairóng}} '''Qian Nai-rong''' ({{zh icon}}:钱乃荣, {{IPA-wuu|zɪnɛjoŋ|}}) was born in 1945<ref name= "Wizard"/> in [[the People's Republic of China|China]]. He received a Master's Degree in Chinese Literature from [[Fudan University]] in 1981. He is a Professor of [[Chinese Language and Literature]] in [[Shanghai University]] where he is also the head of his department. He is the most senior researcher and popularizer of [[Shanghainese]],<ref name= "Wizard">{{cite web|url = http://www.cnngo.com/shanghai/play/qian-nairong-man-bringing-shanghai-dialect-back-fashion-085472 |publisher= [[CNNGo]] |title = Word wizard: The man bringing Shanghainese back to the people |quote= A 65-year-old professor preserving Shanghai's local language has become an unlikely popular icon |date = 2010-06-03 |author = Tracy You }}</ref> a dialect of [[Wu Chinese]]. ==Publications== * ''Shanghainese Slang'' (Shanghai Academy of Social Sciences Press, 1989) - <<上海方言俚语>>（上海社科院出版社，1989） * ''Contemporary Wu-ngu Researches'' (Shanghai Education Press, 1992) - <<当代吴语研究>> （上海教育出版社，1992） * ''Grammar for Shanghainese Language'' (Shanghai People's Publishing House, 1997) - <<上海话语法>> （上海人民出版社，1997） * ''Cool Slang 2000 Items'' (Editor, Shanghai Education Press, 2001) - <<酷语2000>> （主编，上海教育出版社，2001） * ''Shanghainese Conversations'' - <<上海语会话>> 音带（本人发音，日本东方书店） * ''Shanghainese & Su-zhou Dialect Researches & Studies'' - <<上海语苏州语学习与研究>> （合作，日本东京光生馆，1984） * ''A Brief History of Dialects in Shanghai Metropolitan Areas'' (Shanghai Education Press, 1988) - <<上海市区方言志>> （合作，上海教育出版社，1988） * ''Vocabulary for Shanghainese Dialects'' (Shanghai Education Press, 1991) - <<上海方言词汇>> （合作，上海教育出版社，1991） * ''A Brief History of the Culture & Dialects for Shanghai Area'' (Shanghai Literature and Art Publishing House, 2001) - <<上海文化通史·语言篇>> （上海文艺出版社，2001） * ''Shanghainese Dialect Collection & the Culture'' (Shanghai Culture Publishing House, 2002) -
